module.name: visualservoingclient
module.description: iCub device (plugin, client) for visual servoing.
module.description-long:
An image-based visual servoing controller for iCub.
This is the device (YARP plugin) that sends command to the visualservoingserver device.

param.desc: mandatory, specify a local port name to be used to connect to the server.
mandatory, the port name of the server.

server.description: Command port to send commands to the visual servoing server
